metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7165 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow in DOSBox 0.74-2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-7165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dosbox - 0.74-3-1
dosbox-debug - 0.74-3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dosbox package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.74-3-1').
